all I can say is wow..

--- On Sun, 1/2/11, purplespacefriend <purplealieng=
irl@...> wrote:


From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>=

Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: The case for faces.
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Dat=
e: Sunday, January 2, 2011, 11:39 AM


=C2=A0 



Well, for one thing, I do=
n't own the group anymore. Due to one of these incessent argurments, I had =
to back away from this some years ago as I almost got fired becuase yet som=
eone else that thought they knew so much more forwarded all my e-mails to m=
y boss. 

Then someone else seemed to be insinuating that I may have tamper=
ed with the imgaes. Very insulting. This stuff goes on an on, regardless of=
 the quality of voices, or the images. I have reached my saturation point. =
There seems to be nothing more to be gained by presenting anything else. No=
w, I can sympatize with Richard Roberts!

The group will continue, as there=
 are a number of box and paranormal experts here that are more than happy t=
o tell everyone what this stuff really is and how it works. 

I didn't mean=
 to create bad any feelings.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adrienn=
e" <abortree@...> wrote:
>
> Hi 
> 
> Thank you for getting back to me. I t=
hought I had destroyed the group by accident. Awful feeling! 
> 
> I comple=
tely understand and am very grateful that he started this group and is will=
ing to share and let share ideas and files. God forbid he should leave!! I'=
m not used to looking at video this way so it would be easy for me to miss =
a lot. I did see the Upside Down Lincoln and the face at the end in the sec=
ond attachment of "If this is the only one..." I need more practice and a m=
ore open mind, I think. This is all so far reaching. Thank goodness he, esp=
ecially (and the others in this group) are doing this and sharing these ide=
as. Kudos to Frank for all of his work!
> 
> -Adrienne
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kalin <kalinu@> wrote:
> >
> > I'm glad you took an=
other look..hey listen we all are learning here..that message was not solel=
y to you..I never saw you try to correct anyone on what they where hearing =
but some on here does ALOT...its starting to sound as if they feel like the=
y knew more then anyone and most just started doing this where..Frank,Steve=
 and some other have been doing this for years..Some even have the nerve to=
 try to talk done to Frank..now remember this is the man the made the box..=
so i just think its insulting and ignorant. I for one will be really pissed=
 of if they ran him from his own group..
> > 
> > --- On Fri, 12/31/10, Adr=
ienne <abortree@> wrote:
> > 
> >

> >

 and I'm here to learn so I think I'll just take it all in for a while and =
not butt in to what I don't understand yet, sorry.
> > 
> > Thank you for m=
aking me go back and look again.
> > 
> > -Adrienne

groups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > I'm th=
inking there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech, and
> > > =
> not just EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living or=

> > > > dead), the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs =
from boxes
> > > > and also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are p=
retty impressive in
> > > > person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embe=
dded.
> > > > 
> > > > I know, it's not ghost hunters, and most don't want =
to have to think.
> > > > I think most want this stuff in a neat little box=
, all well defined, all
> > > > rules and protocols known, but it just won'=
t stay in one box, or universe
> > > > for that matter.
> > > > 
> > > > Fr=
ank-S
> > > >
> > > Dear Frank,
> > > 
> > > I think that I see what you me=
an. I mean no offense, but I it would be helpful to see something a little =
more definitive that couldn't be mistaken for matrixing. Is this possible? =
Is it just me?
> > > 
> > > - Adrienne
> > >
